name: Armor-Piercing Rounds
desc: Deal an additional 20% damage (+20% per stack) to bosses.

name: Backup Magazine
desc: Add +1 (+1 per stack) charge of your Secondary skill.

name: Bison Steak
desc: Increases maximum health by 25 (+25 per stack).

name: Bundle of Fireworks
desc: Activating an interactable launches 8 (+4 per stack) fireworks that deal 300% base damage.

name: Bustling Fungus
desc: After standing still for 1 second, create a zone that heals for 4.5% (+2.25% per stack) of your health every second to all allies within 3m (+1.5m per stack).

name: Cautious Slug
desc: Increases base health regeneration by +3 hp/s (+3 hp/s per stack) while outside of combat.

name: Crowbar
desc: Deal +75% (+75% per stack) damage to enemies above 90% health.

name: Delicate Watch
desc: Increase damage by 20% (+20% per stack). Taking damage to below 25% health breaks this item.

name: Energy Drink
desc: Sprint speed is improved by 25% (+25% per stack).

name: Focus Crystal
desc: Increase damage to enemies within 13m by 20% (+20% per stack).

name: Gasoline
desc: Killing an enemy ignites all enemies within 12m (+4m per stack) for 150% base damage. Additionally, enemies burn for 150% (+75% per stack) base damage.

name: Item Scrap, White
desc: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

name: Lens-Maker's Glasses
desc: Your attacks have a 10% (+10% per stack) chance to 'Critically Strike', dealing double damage.

name: Medkit
desc: 2 seconds after getting hurt, heal for 20 plus an additional 5% (+5% per stack) of maximum health.

name: Mocha
desc: Increases attack speed by 7.5% (+7.5 per stack) and movement speed by 7% (+7% per stack).

name: Monster Tooth
desc: Killing an enemy spawns a healing orb that heals for 8 plus an additional 2% (+2% per stack) of maximum health.

name: Oddly-shaped Opal
desc: Increase armor by 100 (+100 per stack) while out of danger.

name: Paul's Goat Hoof
desc: Increases movement speed by 14% (+14% per stack).

name: Personal Shield Generator
desc: Gain a shield equal to 8% (+8% per stack) of your maximum health. Recharges outside of danger.

name: Power Elixir
desc: Taking damage to below 25% health consumes this item, healing you for 75% of maximum health.

name: Repulsion Armor Plate
desc: Reduce all incoming damage by 5 (+5 per stack). Cannot be reduced below 1.

name: Roll of Pennies
desc: Gain 3 (+3 per stack) gold on taking damage from an enemy. Scales over time.

name: Rusted Key
desc: A hidden cache containing an item (80%/20%) will appear in a random location on each stage. Opening the cache consumes this item.

name: Soldier's Syringe
desc: Increases attack speed by 15% (+15% per stack).

name: Sticky Bomb
desc: 5% (+5% per stack) chance on hit to attach a bomb to an enemy, detonating for 180% TOTAL damage.

name: Stun Grenade
desc: 5% (+5% on stack) chance on hit to stun enemies for 2 seconds.

name: Topaz Brooch
desc: Gain a temporary barrier on kill for 15 health (+15 per stack).

name: Tougher Times
desc: 15% (+15% per stack) chance to block incoming damage. Unaffected by luck.

name: Tri-Tip Dagger
desc: 10% (+10% per stack) chance to bleed an enemy for 240% base damage.

name: Warbanner
desc: On level up or starting the Teleporter event, drop a banner that strengthens all allies within 16m (+8m per stack). Raise attack and movement speed by 30%.
